# Boxplot, p450 by site name

```{r}
#p450 is in activity/ mg protein

pplot<- ggplot(apdata, aes(x = site_name, y = p450)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, size = 14),  
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 14) 
  )

print(pplot)

```
